name: How to Make Patbingsu (Korean Shaved Ice)
description: You Will Need Ice (1 tray/bowl) Sweetened Condensed Milk Sweetened Adzuki Bean Paste (You could also try making this at home) Matcha Powder Fruit Cocktail Tteok/Mochi/Rice Cake Green Tea Ice Cream (or whichever flavor you'd like) Shaved Ice Machine...
